descriptionSet.description: On the back of this postcard, we see a message for J.D.Gardner as well as his address and a stamp from India Postage.

inscription.text: This side may have a message written upon it for Inland Postage, but the right hand side must be reserved for address and stamp only. Series No. 2097 B.B. London Printed in Saxony AMBALA. [...][Indecipherable] - these are too snatchy for anything - must be careful it keeps off the firing point - or else go on the steady + play Tennis with "Kelly's own." " Must be in Ambala on 16. without fail. Our Hop. [...][Indecipherable] Post Card The Address to be written on this side. Serg. J.D. Gardner 3rd (Lahore) Division Lahore Cantonment

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art

rights.text: Copyrighted. Copyright with the original artists and publishers.
